meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Aaron Cappocchi Rosanne Lightstone Sarah Fowlkes Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6395.

td.p: Aaron Cappocchi, a writer from Burbank, California
Rosanne Lightstone, an automotive quality engineer from Royal Oak, Michigan
Sarah Fowlkes, an attorney from Brooklyn, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,800)

tr.td: A BARE BONES CATEGORY
DENMARK
DA TRAIN! DA TRAIN!
THE TV CHARACTER WHO WASN'T THERE
(Alex: We're talking about shows where the--one of the characters was rarely, if ever, seen on camera.)
PROVERBIAL NUMBERS
THINGS YOU HAVE TO DO
